column4: hi, in want to adjust the lcd brightness of my monitor with the terminal ... in the internet i found that  echo -n 100 > /proc/acpi/video/VGA/LCD/brightness would work ... but i got as response bash: /proc/acpi/video/VGA/LCD/brightness: No such file or directory
please tell me what to do to fix this?
try one of the found pathes

i tried with every direction ... with one it worked when i chaged them with gedit (but when i wanted to save the file i got some attentionmessanges --- now i tried to change it with the terminal and it doesn't work ... sudo echo -n 0 > /proc/acpi/video/GFX0/DD02/brightness
use "tee", echo redirection won't work with sudo
what's the syntax of tee - hoe do i use it
